post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
The best ranked Eclipse plug-in currently in logging. It supports Eclipse 2.x and 3 by means of Log4j, Apache Commons Logging and JDK's standard. I guess it also goes well with WSAD 5.x. Try out and you will be happy.
http://log4e.jayefem.de/
post.title: Log4e - Eclipse plug-in
